body: Khalid, You can use the native GH math components to interpolate between the hours to get values on the half-hour like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/n58KY*tFeDQ-rkB4gxwFHsMTxFkKsTrihyW6HTz6zIGdAkhgyHV-DUYag0MylyfgmJqgAuLvjU440CjZidsmSiQorAw0Ic65/DiffIllum2.JPG) I attached the GH file that shows you how to do this.  This interpolation is also what I am doing in this example file where I calculate ASE on the half-hour: [http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Estimate_Glare_Potential_Over_a_Year) -Chris
